name: .GUIDES File Extension
summary: Learn about .GUIDES files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by xScope, a program used for designing user interface mockups for mobile applications; saves a set of guides, which are vertical or horizontal markers on the the user interface mockup; allows the guides to remembered and reused across multiple interface designs.

content: To open a GUIDES file in xScope, choose Guides → Open Guides... from the application menu. To save guides, choose Guides → Saved Guides As....

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
